alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 8:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ulster and northwestern Dutchess Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 819 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Shokan, or 16 miles west of Kingston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingston, Rhinebeck, Hyde Park, Hurley, Woodstock, Red Hook, West Shokan, Kenneth L Wilson Campground, High Falls, Lake Katrine, Staatsburg, Tillson, West Hurley, Olivebridge, Port Ewen, Woodland Valley Campground, Esopus, Rosendale, Marbletown and Cherrytown. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess; Western Ulster
